name: link-package
description: A package to help resolve npm link dependencies during the Bazel transition. Other packages link to the packages installed in its node_modules directory. Should never be published.

scripts.build: yarn build-link-package-core && yarn build-tflite && yarn reinstall
scripts.reinstall: yarn && yarn reinstall-link-package-core && yarn cache clean @tensorflow/tfjs-tflite && rimraf node_modules && yarn
